title: "failed to load/verify boot images" after Windows 10 update
content: Got my Pixel 3a today, set it up with a PIN and fingerprint recognition. Saw there was an update to Android 10 (it was on 9), so I allowed that to download and install. After a reboot, it wanted my PIN, but wouldn't accept it. I powered it down and rebooted. It booted into Fastboot Mode, which fails with the message "failed to load/verify boot images". It's using Boot-slot a. I use the volume keys to select "Rescue mode" and press power, but it repeats the Fastboot failure. I haven't yet put a sim card into this phone, but can't see why that would make a difference.
